name: State of Anarchy
description: Simplistic top-down shooter that will put a smile on your face. Fulfill your inner sociopath as you mow down enemies with guns and cars alike, in a bid to pull off the world's largest heist!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium 2Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 95 MB available space Sound Card: Stereo Sound

reviews.review_text: Well, I probably won't come back to this game often, but I had fun playing it.

Simple and amusing, this cheap game is probably one of the best (Russian made) indie games you can find on Steam right now.  Even though it gets kind of dull after playing a bunch of similarly structured levels, it still remains entertaining for a while, and makes a better game than Hatred with all of its engine features.   Also has cards now.
This is an interesting game: unique, good value, and deeply flawed. For the price it’s worth picking up.
It is a good time waster game and it is fun to play for 79p what can you ask for really. 7/10
When you want GTA so much but you're in school and got some spare notebook, this is the result.

What a game, I bought it for around 40p last month and never really played it until today when my friend Alex came over. The cars are extremely fun and it was such a good game that my frien bought it. I recommend it to all!

A friend gifted me this for 20 cents, it wasnt worth it at all.   Its basically a flash game where you run around killing people then rob a bank with a miniboss to get a better gun. Thats the entire game. Probably an hour and a half of reptetive content at most.
Simple and amusing, this cheap game is probably one of the best indie games you can find on Steam right now.
Nice Gameplay and Graphic, Like GT@ 2 :lol: This game graphic make this game so unique But, it more 'perfect' if u add more color to the game xD Overall is Great, 9.5/10 to SoA
It would be very difficult to find more fun for the fifty cents I just paid for State of Anarchy.
it is pretty fun when you have a cat that licks dogs.

Well basically what we have is top-down shooter rampage, kind a reminds me a bit of old gta 1 or 2, just this is like drawn on paper. Really interesting and fun, for damn 59 cents graphic and sounds are satisfactory.  Yea it will give you few hours of fun :)
Even an 11 cent flash game is 11 cents too expensive.
Should you buy this game?  Got a dollar and a half an hour to kill? why the hell not?
Fun for a while then it gets a bit samey but it is 50c so who the ♥♥♥♥ cares
